name: TokoNFT
description: TokoNFT is a NFT marketplace on the BSC network that provides a Metaverse NFT gallery with Web 3.0 access to bring the new experience for digital art enthusiasts. TokoNFT provides features such as NFT Staking to incentivized NFT Traders on TokoNFT, Metaverse NFT Gallery and NFT Launchpad. TokoNFT also presents a token that will facilitate all kinds of transactions, governance and staking rewards for users of TokoNFT. Users will be able to interact with each others & enjoying new experiences in meta world. Buying an artwork, held their own exhibitions, watching live concert and also wearing the NFT Fashion items bought from TokoNFT Marketplace.
